NOTICE OF MOTION Mr Chabinga Adopt Report of the Parliamentary Select Committee: That this House do adopt the Report of the Parliamentary Select Committee appointed to scrutinise the Presidential appointment of Mr Roy Ngulube, to serve as Clerk of the National Assembly, Dr Pamela Towela Sambo, Dr Felicity Kayumba Kalunga, Mrs Panic Malawo Chilufya and Fr Joseph Komakoma, to serve as Chairperson, Vice Chairperson and Commissioners of the Human Rights Commission, respectively, and Dr Tommy Susiku Namitondo, to serve as Commissioner of the Anti-Corruption Commission, for the Third Session of the Thirteenth National Assembly, laid on the Table of the House on Thursday, 21st September, 2023 ORDER OF THE DAY 1.
